flamesdev.neon.physics

Interface Hitbox

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CircularHitbox, RectangularHitbox

    public interface Hitbox
    An interface for hitboxes.

        highX - the high X bound
        lowY - the low Y bound

        boolean intersectsHitbox(Hitbox other)
                  throws sun.reflect.generics.reflectiveObjects.NotImplementedException
        Parameters:

        Returns:
